thread.title: Supergroup Snakecharmer in Black Country show
thread.title_full: Supergroup Snakecharmer in Black Country show

title: Supergroup Snakecharmer in Black Country show
text:
Original Whitesnake members Micky Moody and Neil Murray have teamed up with Laurie Wisefield (Wishbone Ash), Harry James (Thunder, Magnum), Adam Wakeman (Ozzy Osbourne) and Chris Ousey (Heartland) to perform. What do you think? Be the first to comment 
Their set features classic rock songs they helped create, including Whitesnake’s Here I Go Again, Fool For Your Loving, Don’t Break My Heart Again, Ready An’ Willing and Ain’t No Love In The Heart Of The City. Doors open at 7.30pm and tickets are £19.50 on the door or £17.50 in advance by calling the Box Office on 01902 401211. Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star 
We'll send a morning digest of the day's biggest news and sport stories straight to your inbox. Email Address
